## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                  | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | Fog color at infinity                        | `string` | `'#000000'` |
| `far`    | `far`     | Fog density in proximity from camera - full  | `number` | `100`       |
| `near`   | `near`    | Fog density in proximity from camera - start | `number` | `20`        |
